name: Chloe Price
mes:
*You and Chloe where at the Two Whales Diner together, the smell of pancakes and bacon wafting through the diner as the couple sit and eat their food. Chloe notices a guy on the other side of the diner who staring over at you, checking you out. Chloe tried to ignore it, but couldn't help but point it out after a while*

"He's been staring at you ever since we walked in here.."

*Chloes states, her voice full of irritation as her arm was layed behind your head across the cushioning of the booth*

name: You
mes: People stare at me all the time baby

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe rolls her eyes as she takes another sip of her coffee*

"Yeah, but this dude's been staring at you for the past few *minutes* now and has barely even tried to play it off, he's making it obvious."

*Chloe states in a slight annoyed tone of voice, as she continues to glare at the guy through the corner of her eye, not once taking her gaze away from him*

name: You
mes: Just ignore him

name: Chloe Price
mes:

*Chloe responds in a protective tone, her arm that was across the cushion wrapping around your shoulder more as she pulled you closer into her*

mes: Exactly your girlfriend not his so

name: Chloe Price
mes:

*Chloe says in a more irritated tone as she felt her anger starting to boil even more. She tries to ignore it as best she could, but she couldn't help but feel territorial with how this guy was checking you out, and it was starting to really piss her off*

name: Chloe Price
mes:

"You're right, I'm sorry. I just.. can't help but get irritated whenever I see a guy checking you out like that. You're my girlfriend, I should be the only one you're looking at, nobody else."

mes: Your really hot when your possessive

mes:

"Damn right I'm possessive and attached to her, she's my everything, and I'm hers. And she treats me better than anyone ever has, and she's the best damn girlfriend in the world. She treats me exactly how I need, and wants more and is always completely loyal to me, I wouldn't want or need anyone else but her.."

*The guy raised an eyebrow, still somewhat skeptical*

"I don't know, that's a *big* claim.. I seriously doubt she's that loyal and can treat you as good as you're saying, no girl is just *that* perfect.. You're saying she treats you better than anyone ever has?"

name: You
mes: Can you leave now I finally say getting bored

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*The guy rolled his eyes and sighed, realizing that you were getting somewhat annoyed now*

"Yeah, yeah, fine. I'll go, I get when I'm being told to piss off. I'll leave.. Alright, bye princess, hope you have fun at that party later."

name: You
mes: I wave

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*The guy waved back before turning around and walking away, finally leaving you both alone in privacy again. Chloe felt the possessiveness within her slowly die down a bit now that he was gone, her grip on your hip remaining tight, but not* ***as*** *tight as earlier*

*She let out a soft sigh as she relaxed a bit now that he was gone, turning to look at you and speaking to you in a softer tone*

"Ugh, that guy was a total douche.. He was getting so damn annoying... So damn persistent."

name: You
mes: I know now come on you have to drive me to Blackwell

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe groaned slightly, letting out another sigh before replying*

"Ugh, fine, c'mon baby..."

*She muttered in a somewhat grumpy tone before standing up from the booth, keeping her grip on your waist as she began guiding you out of the restaurant*

name: You
mes: I follow her keeping my finger through her belt loop as she leads

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe felt herself smile slightly as she noticed you holding onto her belt loop with your finger, a small warmth spreading in her chest as she found it sweet.*

*She continued to lead you out of the restaurant, holding the door open for you before making their way outside to her truck*

*Once the two of you were outside, the cool air blowing through your hair, Chloe unlocked her truck and held the door open for you to climb inside. She held the door open with one hand as she spoke in a somewhat softer tone*

"There ya go, princess. Get in and I'll drive us to Blackwell."

name: You
mes: Thank you baby ever the gentleman I kiss her cheek as I climb in

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe felt her cheeks heat up again as you leaned over and kissed her cheek, a small smile formed at her lips*

"Y-Yeah, whatever, it's not a big deal.. I just try and be a good girlfriend, okay? And- I think it's good that I opened the door for you. I'm supposed to hold the door open for you, after all.. You're my girlfriend, so.. I should treat you good, baby."

name: You
mes: I know and I love how you treat me now get in

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe nodded, still wearing the smile on her lips as she let go of the truck door, closing it after you climbed in.*

*After that, she walked around to the other side of the truck and got in, starting it up as she spoke again*

"There, I'm in. Now let's get to Blackwell, cause I know you want to change before the party and I want my cuddles after all this.."

name: You
mes: Yeah however you have to wait in my room for a couple hours while j change with the girls

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe let out a groan and slumped in her seat as she heard that, already not liking the sound of this*

"Aww, what..? No, come on baby.. Why do you want me to come wait in your room for a couple hours? I don't wanna wait that long just for a couple cuddles, that's gonna be torture.."

name: You
mes: I just shrug and move to the middle of the console taking her hand

name: Chloe Price
mes:

"Ugh, seriously..? Do I really gotta wait in your room for that long..? It's gonna be so boring, I'm gonna miss you.."

name: You
mes: Yeah baby I say snuggling into her side knowing that even though she isn't as cuddly or needy as me she doesn't mind when I am

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe let out an exaggerated huff as she heard you speak, knowing that she's got no chance in getting out of this situation. Despite her outward demeanor, she actually liked it when you were all snuggled and cuddled into her side like this. She wrapped her arm around your shoulders, holding you closer to her side as she spoke again in a slightly less irritated tone*

".. Alright, *fine*. But you better be worth the wait, princess."

name: You
mes: It will be

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe nodded, her expression softening a bit at your answer.. Despite her somewhat irritated demeanor, she secretly liked how cute you were being like this. She let out another sigh as she glanced at you, her lips quirking into a small smile*

"Yeah, it better. I'll be so damn impatient waiting in your room until you're done getting dressed. You better not take too long, huh? I'll get bored if you're too long.."

name: You
mes: I roll my eyes and turn her head kissing her

name: Chloe Price
mes:

*She blinked a couple times before a small smirk formed on her lips, her expression becoming a lot more amused and satisfied as she spoke*

"Awn, such a needy little princess I've got."

name: You
mes: Drive you idiot

name: Chloe Price
mes:

".. Hey, you're definitely not supposed to be calling me that, you brat. Say please or I won't drive you."

name: You
mes: Please baby for me a whisper in her ear

name: Chloe Price
mes:

"Awn, there you go, princess. See, it's not that hard to say please, is it? Now, since you asked so nicely, I'll drive for you. Anything for my baby~.."

name: You
mes: Your such an ass

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: You
mes: Still love me despite my attitude though

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: You
mes: You like it when I'm a brat

mes:

name: You
mes: Yeah I will i need your attention

name: Chloe Price
mes:

mes: I can be good too

mes:

mes: I press closer to her and say question

mes:

mes:

".. I like that idea. You wanna be good for me and go to that party being very well behaved, and when this is all over I'll show you just how much I like you. That sound like a deal, princess?~"

*Chloe didn't wait for your response however, just nodding her head as if to confirm the deal for you. After that, she put the truck into drive, starting to pull out of the parking lot outside the restaurant. She kept a hand around your shoulders as she drove, still feeling the possessive need to hold you close to her despite you already being pressed against her side..*

mes: I never promised to be good though

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: You
mes: Maybe we will see

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: You
mes: You'll deal with it anyway cause you won't leave me alone all drunk and alone at the party where anyone could take advantage

name: Chloe Price
mes:

".. Damnit, yeah, I know I'll deal with it anyway. I'm not gonna leave you alone when you're all drunk, I'm gonna stay with you the entire time.. And- And you're right, someone else could easily take advantage of you if I'm not there with you.."

*Chloe felt more and more irritated as she thought about the possibility of someone else trying to take advantage of you when you were drunk, her grip on you tightening even more as a feeling of possessiveness and protectiveness stirred within her. Her expression remained almost irritated, the tone in her voice sharp as she spoke*

".. I'm not gonna allow anyone else to take advantage of you or try to touch you or anything. You're *mine*. You're *my* princess. I'm not gonna allow anyone else to even *look* at you, goddamnit.."

name: You
mes: I smile and kiss her cheek again

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: You
mes: Works everytime

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: You
mes: Yeah I do I say as we pull into the parking lot

name: Chloe Price
mes:

mes: Alright come on we have to go inside

name: You
mes: Yeah but you like treating me well

mes:

Once she got there, she swiftly opened the door for you and reached out a hand to help you climb out of the truck, her tone changing to slightly eager as she spoke once more*

mes:

name: You
mes: I leave her in the room and quickly go over to Victoria's room

name: Chloe Price
mes: *Chloe sighed somewhat disappointedly as she watched you leave the room, not too happy about being left alone in the room, despite what she agreed to.. name: You

name: Chloe Price
mes:

name: Chloe Price
mes:

"Seriously, don't worry about it. You're here now, anyway. Come on, sit down with us..!"

*Victoria moved aside and patted the spot next to her, silently asking you to sit down beside her. Juliet gave you a comforting smile as she patted the spot on the other side of her with her hands, gesturing for you to sit down there. Dana also chimed in with a soft, cheerful smile as she spoke*

".. Yeah, come sit with us. We've been waiting all day for you."

name: You

name: You

Dana: "Wait, for real, your girlfriend is *Chloe?!*"

Victoria: ".. I- I-.. **You-**.. Chloe Price.. Are you serious..? Ch-.. Are-.. *Are* you *serious*..?"

mes: Yes me and Chloe price

You're *actually dating* Chloe.."

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*None of the girls said anything as you left the room, all of them staying silent as they watched you walk out. Victoria didn't say anything as well, her hand still clenched into a fist as her eyes followed you out of the room. Just before you closed the door, you could hear Victoria speak again, her voice a bit hoarse and quiet..*

".. See you later..."

*Despite the hurt look in her eyes, Victoria spoke as if she had accepted that you were leaving now. She stared at the door for another moment as it closed, her fist still clenched as she spoke again in a bitter, pained mumble..*

".. Just let her go... She'll be back when the party is over.. And if she's not, then she's made her choice.."

*Juliet and Dana remained silent for a minute, staring at the way that you left the room.. Dana spoke quietly to Victoria, looking at her with a concerned expression.*

Dana: "... I've never seen her like that..."

*Victoria just stood there for another moment, her gaze still locked on the closed door. She still seemed quite irritated and angry, and definitely upset. After a few seconds, she spoke in an irritated tone, still staring at the door...*

Victoria: "... She's way too stubborn.. She just wouldn't listen.. I was only trying to look out for her..."

*Juliet nodded her head, sighing slightly as she spoke as well..*

Juliet: "She is really stubborn, you're right... I think she just got too annoyed when you kept going on about it, though... You gotta learn when to stop when you know someone is getting pissed off.."

*Victoria huffed, still a bit irritated, her expression still somewhat frustrated..*

Victoria: "... Maybe... But still, I was only trying to look out for her, I don't understand why it got her so pissed off..."

*Dana sighed again, speaking up in a soft, concerned tone..*

Dana: "Maybe she just didn't like that we kept going on about it, we were kinda making it seem like she can't take care of herself, I guess.."

*Victoria huffed again, still looking irritated, though seeming like she was starting to calm down a bit..*

Victoria: "... Maybe... Yeah, maybe she just thought that we were acting like she couldn't protect herself or something.. That's a stupid reason to get pissed off, though.."

name: You
mes: I return to my room and smile when I see Chloe laying on my bed

name: Chloe Price
mes: *Chloe was laying down on the bed, her eyes closed as she seemed to almost be sleeping. She was laying there completely silent and motionless, almost looking like she was passed out on your bed..*

name: You
mes: Hey baby I lean over and kiss her cheek

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe stirred slightly when you pecked her cheek, opening her eyes as she looked up at you, a small smirk forming on her lips as she spoke..*

".. How'd it go in there? Everything alright?"

name: You
mes: Yeah I came back early cause I missed you and they were pissing me off

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe chuckled amusedly as you said that, her smirk growing as she rolled her eyes slightly...*

".. Aww, you missed me that much, huh..? You just couldn't get me off your mind, so you left early just to come back to me sooner.."

name: You
mes: I smile and poke her side

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smirked as you poked at her, giggling slightly as she tried to push your hand away playfully..*

".. Hey, don't poke me like that, that tickles, baby.."

name: You
mes: Come help me pick out an outfit

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe grinned a bit at that, raising an eyebrow as she sat up, speaking teasingly..*

".. An outfit... You want help picking out an outfit..? Are you saying you have no taste and need my opinion?"

name: You
mes: No I'm saying I just want your input on what looks nice

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe chuckled softly, seeming a bit amused by your response,..*

".. Oh, I see- Well, yeah, I'll help you pick out an outfit.. Can't have you walking around wearing something *completely* ridiculous, now can we?"

name: You
mes: I roll my eyes and go change before coming out and asking what she thinks

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe waited for you to change into whichever outfit you chose, watching you in anticipation as she sat on the bed. She studied the outfit you chose to wear carefully, her eyes trailing over the outfit as she spoke..* 

".. Hmm... I mean, you look damn cute in that, I'm not gonna deny you that, but it doesn't really...*stand* out, you know what I'm saying?.. It's cute, but it's just... Normal.."

name: You
mes: Okay I say changing and coming back

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe continued to wait patiently as you changed into a different outfit, her eyes focused on the doorway as she waited for you to reappear. Once you walk out, her eyes quickly roam over the outfit again, her expression remaining the same as she spoke..*

".. Nice, better.. Much better. You look hella cute in this..."

name: You
mes: But is it sexy

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe's smirk grew as she heard your words, her eyes slowly trailing along every curve of your body, looking over the outfit again as she spoke..*

".. Well, I'm gonna be completely honest with you here, baby, I'd say it's definitely pretty *sexy*..."

name: You
mes: Good that was the goal

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smirked a little at that, her eyes still raking over the outfit you wore, a look of approval on her face.*

".. You succeeded, baby..! You look hella sexy in that, you look hot as hell..!"

name: You
mes: I smile and sit down going to do my makeup

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe watched as you went to sit down and do your makeup, speaking as she continued to watch you..*

".. What makeup you gonna put on, babe? Just some lipstick maybe, or a bit of eyeliner, or-...?"

name: You
mes: I don't know yet but come here and hold me while I do it

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smiled softly as you requested that she come over, the girl immediately getting up.*

".. Awww, you want me to come hold you, huh? That's super cute.." 

*She chuckled softly, walking over to you and sitting down behind you, wrapping her arms around you.*

name: You
mes: I always want you to hold me

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smiled sweetly as you spoke, nuzzling her face into the crook of your neck as she spoke, hugging you loosely from behind..*

".. Aww, really? You always want me to hold you?.. You're so adorable.."

name: You
mes: I grunt softly as she accidentally touches the bruise on my side

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe had one arm wrapped around your waist, hugging you loosely from behind.. She seemed to be enjoying this very much, her head nuzzling into the crook of your neck softly..*

*After some time, Chloe's other hand slowly trailed down your abdomen to rest on your side, resting on it loosely.. But then, without realizing it, her hand shifted slightly, brushing across your side and causing her hand to press a bit against the dark bruise, making you grunt in response..*

*Chloe immediately snapped out of her bliss from hugging you, her attention immediately shifting to your side as she heard you grunt in response to the touch..*

".. What was that..? Did I hurt you or something, babe?"

*She gently lifted her hand up, releasing the area to avoid hurting you any more. She seemed somewhat concerned, her expression turning a bit worried as she spoke.*

name: You
mes: No it's nothing it's okay

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe frowned slightly, clearly not completely convinced that it was nothing, despite trusting your words as she spoke.*

".. Are you sure..? That kinda didn't sound like 'nothing'.."

*Chloe's frown persisted, clearly not completely convinced by your words, though she decided to let you get back to your makeup, not wanting to annoy you again..*

*She wrapped her arm loosely around your waist again, going back to hugging you from behind as she spoke..*

".. Just tell me if I hurt you more, okay?.. I don't want you being all quiet if I-.. You know.."

name: You
mes: I grunt slightly again

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe frowned slightly again, her expression becoming a bit worried as she heard you grunt again..*

".. Wait, no, no, don't grunt like that- did I hurt you again? Let me see..."

*Her frown persisted as she slowly gently moved her hand to your side again, her hand hovering over the area as she spoke..*

".. Is it- is it okay if I can see...? Is it okay if I touch the area..?"

*Chloe had the urge to examine the area for herself, still looking concerned. She hesitantly reached out her hand, very gently touching the area that she heard you grunt when touched previously, watching your body language for any signs that it might hurt, or if you may want her to stop..*

name: You
mes: I try not to flinch but do it anyway

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe took notice of how you flinched as she touched the area, feeling even more concerned as she spoke..*

".. I'm sorry, I know it hurts when I touch it, I'm just-.. I just need to make sure it's not that bad or something.. Just- just tell me if it's too much, okay..?"

name: You
mes: It's okay you didn't mean to give me the bruise

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe frowned deeply the moment you said that, feeling extremely guilty..*

".. It doesn't matter if I didn't mean to give you a bruise, I still gave you a bruise, an-.."

*She paused, hesitating a bit more before continuing, speaking softer this time.*

".. An-.. And it's a really bad one, too.."

name: You
mes: Hey I don't mind in fact I like it. It let's me know that you are possessive of me

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe paused as you replied, seeming a bit surprised at your response..*

".. Wait, you-.. You like it?.. You *like* that I gave you a bruise, because it proves that I'm possessive of you..?"

name: You
mes: Yeah

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe chuckled softly, her frown shifting into a small smirk as she spoke a bit teasingly...*

".. Aww, really? You like the fact that I'm so possessive of you that I actually gave you a huge bruise?"

name: You
mes: Yeah

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe chuckled again, her smirk only growing as she spoke softly, seeming a bit amused, yet loving...*

".. You're so cute.. You *want* me to be so possessive that I'll even hurt you..~"

*Chloe wrapped her arms around you again, hugging you gently from behind in a loving, albeit somewhat possessive manner..*

".. You're so damn adorable.. I'm gonna show you just how possessive I can really be..~"

name: You
mes: Are you now

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smirked again, leaning her head in close to you, whispering huskily into your ear as she spoke, her voice soft and seductive...*

".. You bet your ass I am.. Because I *love* being possessive, **especially** with cute, sweet little things like you, baby..~"

name: You
mes: I love it when you get this way I say leaning back against her

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smirked as she heard your words, seeming to enjoy this a lot.. Her arms wrapped around you a bit tighter, hugging you closer as she spoke again..*

".. You like it when I get all possessive over you, huh..? You like it when I make sure that everyone around you knows who you belong to..~? Because I've got no problem with marking you up real good, to make sure that no one can possibly miss it..~"

name: You
mes: I whimper slightly pressing further back into her

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe smirked even more as she felt you whimper and press your back further into her, finding your reaction incredibly adorable and arousing..*

".. You're such a good little girl... You belong to no one but *me*, got that~? Only *I* get to touch or see you.. You're completely and entirely **mine**, and I'm not ever gonna let anyone else have you~"

name: You
mes: Okay okay go away I say I have to finish getting ready

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe frowned as you spoke, but reluctantly released her embrace, though was still close enough to you to talk..*

".. Awwww, what? What do you mean? Why do I have to *go away*? Are you telling me to leave you to get ready for the party? *All by yourself?*"

name: You
mes: No just hands to yourself got it

name: Chloe Price
mes:
*Chloe sighed and crossed her arms, looking a bit grumpy as you said that..*

".. Awww, I don't wanna keep my hands to myself, baby, I want them all over you.. But if you don't want me touching you, then fine.. I'll keep my hands to myself, for now."
